activities.loc: Richland County Courtroom, Floor C, Courthouse

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kiefer J. Beran

records.addlTxt: Status conference on December 7, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

1:58 PM 21CF148/22CF94 - Defendant Kiefer J. Beran not in court.  Attorney Steven W. Zaleski in court for Kiefer J. Beran.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Court states that we believe KB is in the Iowa County Jail.

Attorney Zaleski states that KB has multiple cases and one has been set for trial with Judge Day. Attorney Zaleski informs the court that they did have a resolution but due to new charges; they do not have a resolution now. Attorney Zaleski speaks about treatment court possibly in Grant County. Attorney Harper heard. 

Attorney Harper will produce KB if they are informed that KB needs to be here. Attorney Zaleski will make the arrangement  for KB to appear by zoom if not going to be a plea and sentencing.
Status conference scheduled for December 7, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on September 22, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
9/14 Status rescheduled to accommodate Richland County Jury Trial.
Status conference on September 14, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on September 14, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

11:35 AM 21CF148/22CF94 - Defendant Kiefer J. Beran appeared by video, in custody at the Iowa County Jail.  Attorney Steven W. Zaleski appeared by phone for Kiefer J. Beran.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Harper states that she will be moving the court to amend the bond in 21CF148.

22CF94 - Attorney Zaleski waives the formal reading and waives the preliminary hearing. Court states that max penalties. KB waives the preliminary hearing. Court binds over for trial. Attorney Zaleski waives the formal reading on the information and enters a NG plea. States ask for a $2,000 signature bond. No objection. Court orders the $2,000 signature bond.

21CM148 - Attorney Harper request a $3,000 cash bond and explains why. Attorney Zaleski heard and states that KB can post $1,000 cash bond. Court orders $3,000 cash bond. If defendant is able to get into treatment court in Grant County; then the court will re-address bond at that time.
Status conference scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

2:46 PM 21CF148/22CF94 - Defendant Kiefer J. Beran not in court.  Attorney Steven W. Zaleski in court for Kiefer J. Beran.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Zaleski state that KB is in Iowa County. Attorney Harper updates the court on the status of KB and why he is there. Attorney Zaleski state that KB has a status for the Iowa County cases next Wednesday.
Status conference scheduled for August 12, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on August 12, 2022 at 11:00 am.
